message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate, it's fair!
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more for my cleverness!
40 is a bit low, I'm not impressed by your cleverness either!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'll give you 30, but I think I'm getting the better end of this deal now!
30 is still too low, I'm not getting a fair deal!
I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need a fair share!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a quarter of the money, don't think I'm being too generous!
A quarter is still too little, I'm not falling for that!
I'm trying to be realistic, but I need a bit more to make this worthwhile!
I'm getting close to giving up, but I'll give you 20, don't think I'm being too soft!
20 is still too little, I'm not backing down yet!
I'm making a final push, let's end this fairly!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you 15, don't think I'm being too generous!
15 is still too little, I'm not going to settle for that!
This is my last chance, let's make a deal!
I'm out of options, I'll give you 10, don't think I'm being too desperate!
10 is still too little, I'd rather take nothing than accept this!
